Text: Exit the King (French: Le Roi se meurt ) is an absurdist drama by Eugène Ionesco that premiered in 1962.

1:
--------------------
Text: Exit the King:  It is the third in Ionesco's "Berenger Cycle", preceded by "The Killer" (1958) and "Rhinocéros" (1959), and followed by "A Stroll in the Air" (1963).
